Log:
Hello, everyone! We're pleased to announce a new update for the MixUp App! This update was made for prevent Surface pro overheat while using app. Also we added some new requested stuff.
Fixed: - High processor usage while using QR code sharing - High processor usage while using Gallery
Updated: - Camera will start only while it needed. Less processor usage in booth mode. - Optimized liveview (less graphic card usage)
New stuff: - New photo templates - Custom countdown for first photo - You can now set the time to preview the photo after it has been taken
